Boggle is a word game designed by Allan Turoff and originally distributed by Parker Brothers. The game is played using a plastic grid of lettered dice, in which players attempt to find words in sequences of adjacent letters.

Hai necessità di conoscere gli amici che hanno TIM, magari per sfruttare i minuti ed i messaggi offerti dall'operatore? Bene. ""Che Operatore? E' un T.I.M!" è l'applicazione che fa per te! L'applicazione rileva e sincronizza automaticamente tutti i contatti che appartengono all'operatore di telefonia mobile TIM Italia (per il supporto completo di tutti gli operatori fare riferimento all'applicazione "Che Operatore?" su Google Play), fornendo un'informazione precisa anche in caso di portabilità del numero. Inoltre visualizza l'operatore nella rubrica dello smartphone per avere sempre a vista tale informazione. Infine definisce un nuovo gruppo in rubrica che raccoglie tutti i contatti associati all'operatore. A causa del numero notevole di richieste da gestire, alcuni numeri potrebbero non essere riconosciuti correttamente. Pertanto, vi invitiamo a lanciare più volte il processo di sincronizzazione. Ci scusiamo per il disagio. L'applicazione si integra alla rubrica predefinita di android, e quindi è molto facile da usare perché NON c'è bisogno di passare da un applicazione all'altra, ad esempio per chiamare o mandare sms. Caratteristiche: - Al primo avvio dell'applicazione, dopo aver creato l'account, il processo di sincronizzazione si avvia in automatico. - Non devi necessariamente attendere il termine della sincronizzazione. Se chiudi l'app il processo continua in background. Una notifica ti informa sullo stato di avanzamento della sincronizzazione. - Quando vuoi, puoi lanciare manualmente la sincronizzazione (1) cliccando il tasto in alto a destra nella schermata principale dell'applicazione oppure (2) accedendo alle informazioni sull'account mediante Impostazioni -> Account e Sincronizzazione dello smartphone. Note Importanti: • Ai possessori di Android 4.1 Jelly Bean e di Samsung Galaxy S4 : A causa di un bug del Account Manager del Sistema Operativo Android (solo versione 4.1), gli accounts vengono rimossi al riavvio dello smartphone. Per risolvere questo problema, evitando di creare gli accounts ad ogni avvio, occorre installare questa applicazione aggiuntiva gratuita: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.appsfromscratch.checkoperator.workaround • La sincronizzazione richiede una connessione ad Internet. • I numeri telefonici vengono utilizzati esclusivamente per la verifica dell'operatore e NON sono nè memorizzati nè utilizzati per scopi diversi da quello dichiarato. You need to know the friends who TIM, perhaps to take advantage of the minutes and messages provided by the operator? Good. "" What The? It 'a T.I.M! "Is the app for you! The application detects and automatically synchronize all contacts that belong Italian mobile operator TIM (for the full support of all the operators refer to the "What The?" On Google Play), providing accurate information also in the case of number portability. It also displays the operator in the smartphone's address book for quick access to view this information. Finally, it defines a new group in address book that collects all the contacts associated with the operator. Due to the large number of issues to deal with, some numbers may not be recognized properly. Therefore, we invite you to launch multiple times the synchronization process. We apologize for the inconvenience. The application integrates the default address book for android, and so it is very easy to use because there is need to move from one application to another, for example to call or send sms. Features: - When you first start the application, after creating the account, the synchronization process starts automatically. - You do not have to wait for the end of synchronization. If you close the app the process continues in the background. A notification informs you about the progress of the synchronization. - Whenever you want, you can manually start synchronization (1) by clicking the button at the top right of the main screen of the application or (2) accessing account information via Settings -> Accounts & Sync your smartphone. Important Notes: • Holders of Android 4.1 Jelly Bean and Samsung Galaxy S4 : Due to a bug in the Account Manager of the Android OS (version 4.1), the accounts will be removed when you restart your smartphone. To solve this problem, without creating the accounts every time you start, you must install this free add-on application: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.appsfromscratch.checkoperator.workaround • Synchronising requires an Internet connection. • The telephone numbers are only used for verification of the operator and are neither stored nor used for any purpose other than stated.

description: ****** Notice ****** (1) *** It might be respond nothing the first time you pressed it, please try again or wait for a moment. Or if it really does nothing, reboot the device manually please. *** (2) This app contains a widget so you can add it on home screen if you need. (3) It works on * ROOTED * phones only。 Please don't try to download or install this app if you don't know what "root" is. (4) Don't move this app to SD card or any other external storage. It may be cause the app disabled or vanish. (5) I couldn't promise you that this app will work well on any device because of the fragmentation of Android. For example on some Samsung devices, "Reboot Bootloader" just does a normal reboot. (6) The function 'hot reboot' need BusyBox support, so the option will be hidded if BusyBox isn't installed. (7) *** The launcher icon' showing option will take effect after a few seconds on your launcher. Please hold on for a monent. If you want the launcher icon again, just add widget and change the setting option *** Reboot Manager includes the following features: * normal reboot * hot reboot * reboot to recovery * reboot to bootloader * power off *** Thanks for Олег Глядков's Russian support helping. ***

description: โปรแกรม Thailand Post Track & Trace เป็นโปรแกรมอย่างเป็นทางการของระบบ Track and Trace บริษัท ไปรษณีย์ไทย จำกัด ซึ่งถูกออกแบบมาเพื่ออำนวยความสะดวกแก่ผู้ใช้งาน ให้สามารถติดตามตรวจสอบสถานะสิ่งของทางไปรษณีย์ เช่น ไปรษณีย์ด่วนพิเศษ(EMS), ลงทะเบียน(Registred) โลจิสโพสต์ในประเทศ (LogisPost) และ พัสดุระหว่างประเทศ (International Parcel) ได้อย่างง่ายดาย *** หมายเหตุ ฟังก์ชั่นการสแกนบาร์โค๊ด แนะนำให้ติดตั้ง Application "Barcode Scanner" เพื่อใช้งานร่วมกัน *** *** ฟังก์ชั่นแผนที่ในโปรแกรม ใช้ความสามารถของ Google Map ดังนั้นจะต้องเป็น Android 4.0 (ICS) ขึ้นไป จึงทำงานได้ *** คุณสมบัติ - สามารถติดตามตรวจสอบสิ่งของได้หลายชิ้น และแสดงสรุป “สถานะ” ล่าสุดของสิ่งของแต่ละชิ้นได้ที่หน้าจอหลัก ทำให้ผู้ใช้งานสะดวกสบายในการติดตามสิ่งของ - สามารถกำหนดชื่อของบาร์โค้ดสิ่งของแต่ละชิ้นเพื่อง่ายต่อการจดจำ - สามารถแสดงชื่อผู้รับ รวมทั้งลายเซ็นต์ผู้รับ หากผู้รับมีการเซ็นต์ผ่านอุปกรณ์พกพาเมื่อรับสิ่งของ - สามารถแสดงแผนที่เพื่อแสดงเส้นทางการเดินทางของสิ่งของบน Google Map (ต้องเป็น Android 4.0 ขึ้นไป) - ลดการผิดพลาดในการกรอกข้อมูลบาร์โค้ด เพื่อช่วยให้ผู้ใช้งานสามารถรับทราบเมื่อมีการกรอกหมายเลขบาร์โค้ดที่ไม่ถูกต้องตามมาตรฐาน - โปรแกรมรองรับการแสดงผลทั้ง ภาษาไทย และ ภาษาอังกฤษ - สามารถป้อนข้อมูลรหัสบาร์โค๊ด ผ่าน Barcode Scanner App ใน Google Play (เฉพาะอุปกรณ์ที่มีกล้องหลัง) - ไม่มี โฆษณา - แจ้งเตือนอัตโนมัติ (Push Notification) โดยการกดค้างที่รายการสิ่งของที่ต้องการ แล้วเลือกเปิดแจ้งเตือนอัตโนมัติ ***สถานะสิ่งของที่แสดงนำมาจากฐานข้อมูลเดียวกันกับบน Website ทั้งนี้สถานะนำจ่ายจะไม่ได้แสดงในทันที เพราะต้องรอให้เจ้าหน้าที่กลับมาที่ทำการไปรษณีย์เพื่อบันทึกผลนำจ่ายก่อน*** The Thailand Post Track & Trace is an official program of the Thailand Post Track and Trace system, which is designed to facilitate the user. Be able to monitor the state postal items such as Express Mail (EMS), registration (Registred) Logistics posted in (LogisPost) and international shipments. (International Parcel) easily. description: Cdian is a lightweight English-Chinese dictionary that presents clear and concise search results in a swift manner. You can search for words using Chinese, pinyin or English and display results in simplified or traditional text. Features: 　• Completely offline 　• Flexible input/search methods 　　- Pinyin search 　　- Radical character search 　　- Attempts to split sentence input into individual words 　　- Limited wildcard searching using '*' (ZH only and slower than normal searching) 　• Multiple display options 　　- Toggle between simplified/traditional character sets 　　- Select between light & dark themes 　• 3rd party connectivity 　　- Send words directly to AnkiDroid 　　- Can share words with Cdian from other apps 　• Bookmark search results 　• Minimalistic yet functional UI 　• Ad free Please note: 　• Extracted dictionary files require 21MB of external storage space keywords: chinese dictionary, chinese english dictionary, chinese translator, 英文 词典, 辞典, 英汉 词典
release_text: • Removed duplicate radicals in radical input • Slight UI changes • Fixed search results not being displayed on Lollipop devices

description: Singapore's MRT system is expending. But it is also getting complicated. It only saves you travel time if you know what is the best station to transfer. Image below situations: * What is fastest route to get from Ang Mo Kio to Boon Lay? * Hougang to City hall? * Paya Lebar to Buona Vista? Singapore MRT Best Route is designed to allows user to get the best route within seconds. You could grap out your phone and just click any 2 stations, and the best route will be shown right away. Features: * View lastet MRT map on mobile, supports both portrait and landscape rotation * Display the best route between selected 2 stations * Automatically caculate estimated travel time * All functions requrie no internet connection. This app is updated to the lastest MRT system!

There are 12 built-in world-class piano songs. Features:1. Endless Mode; 2. Angst Mode; 3. Challenge Mode; 4. Nice grand piano sound; 5. Leaderboards; As long as taping falling black pieces the wonderful piano songs will be playing plus pleasant grand piano sounds and no time limit pattern & Angst pattern would give you extraordinary feeling. Challenge Mode: You can chllenge your friends, and World Challenge.

description: 'Mini Hamster Breeding' is a simulation game where you breed cute hamsters to 9 for 100 days. Enjoy breeding 3 kinds of hamsters : siberian, golden, roborovski. Feed the hamster with appropriate foods in moderation depending on the type and age for its healthy growth. You can see the food table to do it. The hamster dies when its fed state or health state becomes zero level. So, always check the hamster’s fed state and the health state, and take action for it. You can also feed the hamster water and the pill to improve its health state. The hamster can live up to 90 days. The hamster gives birth to a baby when it’s at the age of 10(days). Breed the hamsters to 9 within 100 days. Keep the instructions of 'Hamster Guide'.

description: In this application, users engage in battle with werewolves online. New users, please refer to the “Entry method” segment in the Help section - The Werewolf game In this game, players are divided into a werewolf camp or a villagers camp. The villagers must attempt to discover the identity of the werewolves by questioning one another. During each unit of time that represents a “day”, players vote for the characters they suspect to be werewolves. The character that receives the most votes is then executed. During the same period, the werewolves can select one character to attack. Victory for the villagers is achieved by executing all werewolves. Victory for the werewolves is achieved by whittling down the villagers until they are outnumbered. - Special features of this application *As Online Werewolf X supports both Web and Smart Phone platforms, users can play and enjoy the game on their preferred device. *As there is no requirement for a Game Manager, users who create villages can also participate in the game. *All players should act out the part of a character. Their preferred image can be selected for use as a character icon. - Local Rules A number of local rules can apply to Werewolf. The following are those relating to the app. *Games are conducted with a minimum of 5 and a maximum of 16 participants. *Roles are automatically allocated based on the number of participants. *Lynching, divining, bodyguarding and attacking can all be conducted from Day One. - Cautions *A Google account is required to participate in the game. *At the end of each game, each participant's identity will be published. Please enter the name you wish to be used in the user information area. *Please refrain from behaviour and contributions that may upset or inconvenience other players.

The VELUX EHF FINAL4 App is the ultimate way to enjoy the best handball action at the highlight of European club handball. Here are some of the features you will find in the VELUX EHF FINAL4 App: - Keep up to date with the latest news from the event - Check out the information and statistics of the VELUX EHF Champions League - Follow the matches with live scoring - Get photos directly from the Arena and be part of the unique feeling that 40,000 handball fans will enjoy in the LANXESS Arena in Cologne, Germany - Watch videos live and on demand: games, interviews and highlights. Get the best handball action in the palm of your hand! - Share it all with your friends and send your comments to the arena through our social media channels. VELUX EHF FINAL4 App is an official VELUX EHF Champions League application. Install the VELUX EHF FINAL4 App for free and be ready to enjoy the event wherever you are.

Emulator for the popular 80's home computer C64. Can be controller via touchscreen, trackball, keyboard and/or external USB/bluetooth controller. Offers an on-screen keyboard for text input. Comes with some Public Domain games, f.e. Elite, Kickstart oder Attack of the Mutant Camels, ready to play! Other games can be added to the SD card and played from there. The emulator is not the fastest, so that a fast CPU is recommended for running it smoothly. The permission to write to SD card is required in order to be able to save changes to .d64 files.
release_text: -zipped C64 images now need to contain the original file type in their filename, e.g. mygame.d64.zip instead of mygame.zip, or they won't get recognized by the emulator

description: Lịch vạn niên đầy đủ thuần Việt. Lịch vạn niên do Zegome có đầy đủ các tính năng cơ bản. Ngoài ra Zegome còn phát triển thêm nhiều tiện ích tuyệt với khác tích hợp chung trong ứng dụng để đưa tới tay người dùng: - Xem lịch âm dương cùng nhiều câu danh ngôn sâu sắc - Tính năng xem thời tiết đặc biệt chính xác với tất cả tỉnh thành tại Việt Nam - Widget cực cool với danh ngôn và lịch ngày tháng - Note: ghi chú trực tiếp vào ngày tháng có lịch hẹn của bạn - Note công việc và các ghi chú quan trọng, đồng thời hẹn giờ nhắc nhở - Hẹn giờ công việc... Lịch vạn niên, lịch vạn sự, lich van su, lich van nien, widget, lich am duong, lịch âm dương, ghi chú, ghi chu, note, hẹn giờ, synch, tất cả đều hiện hữu trong ứng dụng Lịch vạn niên của Zegome. Và còn nhiều nhiều nữa trong Lịch Vạn Niên của Zegome. Tải ngay và trải nghiệm tiện ích số một trong các ứng dụng Lịch vạn niên hiện có. Hãy khám phá bằng sự thông minh tinh tế trong cách sử dụng ứng dụng của bạn.

description: This free music app in which you can listen to live Radio Roxy, and explore new musical sounds - from all decades and genres of music! --- Play the band --- To turn on the Radio Roxy, just run the application. While listening, you can always check the title and artist of the currently played song, see the album cover from which the track and see what will be going on for a while. The application is very intuitive and easy to use. You will find a search engine that after typing a query prompt matching artist names and genres, as well as two pages of ready-stations - Artists and Genres - you can view and sort by station featured, most popular, and in the view alphabetical AZ. On the artists there are more than five hundred stations playing only the greatest hits of the most popular artists and bands from the Polish and the world. Species are more than two hundred best wines stations such as Rock, Alternative Rock, Dubstep, etc., and special stations, for example, with the best music at the carnival, with songs for running and doing exercises, and even stations with hits for children. This application lets you listen to music in high-quality sound for both - using 3G cellular network and a Wi-Fi network. Application settings you can change to a lower quality, so that (for listening via the cellular network) will reduce the amount and cost of data transfer and you can listen to music even with a weaker connection - for example, when driving a car or outside the big cities. --- Information Privacy --- The application stores and accesses data on your device. We use anonymous information stored on your device for the purposes of advertising and statistics. If you do not you approve this agreement, do not install the application. By installing the application you accept the rules described in our Privacy Policy: http://radioagora.pl/polityka-prywatnosci-gra.pdf --- For more information Contact --- Roxy Radio You can listen to the www.radioroxy.pl. If you like our app, add a rating and a comment! If you have questions or suggestions for improvement in the application, please send an email to the address mobile@tuba.fm .

description: Traditional flash cards for learning Italian language enhanced with smartphone technologies like photos, native speakers' dubbing, learning progress visualization, smart adaptive algorithm, and detailed statistics. The program helps you to skip the stage of translating a word into your mother tongue first, but memorizing a direct match of a subject and a foreign word instead. Features: 1000+ words and 65+ categories Explicit photos for all words Voice records by native speakers 5 different learning modes Track your learning progress with detailed statistics Smart algorithm for adapting the learning process 3 dimensions of memorizing: visual, audible and textual

Tic Tac Toe is classic free puzzle game also known as "noughts or crosses or sometimes X and O". Our free Tic Tac Toe game offers: ✓ 4 different game levels (game difficulties) ✓ 2 players game (multiplayer) ✓ different themes (game skins) ✓ game statistics Tic Tac Toe is a game for two players, called X and O, who take turns marking the spaces in a 3×3 grid. The player who succeeds in placing three respective marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row wins the game. Tic Tac Toe is a great way to pass your free time. Stop wasting paper and save trees. Start playing Tic Tac Toe game on your Android device for free. Get the Tic Tac Toe now and let the fun begins!

School learning for kids invites preschool-aged children to listen and learn the ABC in ways that enchant them. All Alphabets of English and Urdu and is fully-featured. Easy to use with nice Graphical images. Features: Animations Sequential order of Number 0 - 10 Sequential order of Tables 2 - 12 Sequential order of Alphabet A - Z Sequential order of Urdu Words Urdu/English/maths words Sounds New: 1 - Find the correct Number. 2 - Find the correct Alphabets. 3 - Find Urdu Words. 4 - Match Images. Futoshiki, also known as "Inequality", is a challenging logic puzzle game from Japan. Similar to Sudoku, the aim of the game is to place the numbers 1-5 in a grid, using the inequality signs to aid you. Every puzzle has just one solution, that can be reached through clever logical deduction. An elegant and relaxing brain game for people of all ages. Features: - 100 puzzles in 4 difficulties. - Soothing sounds of the hang drum as you play. - Save your position in any puzzle to come back to later. - Use the Note function to pencil in squares you're unsure of. - No ads, no special permissions requested. --------- You may also know this game as Hutosiki, More or Less or 不等式. Futoshiki puzzles are published in the UK in The Times, The Guardian and The Daily Telegraph.
release_text: v. 1.0.6 - Sleep prevention, screen kept on while playing v. 1.0.5 - Menu button now brings up options: - Option to clear all - Option to disable sound - Backing out of main menu now quits - Restarting a completed puzzle now instant v. 1.0.4 - Fixed display off-centre bug Thanks to all at reddit.com/r/playmygame for playtesting!

description: Op WTF vind je vermakelijk, opmerkelijk en spraakmakend nieuws uit binnen- en buitenland. Het zijn typisch de berichten en foto’s die je van je vrienden doorgestuurd krijgt en waar iedereen over praat. De WTF.nl-app is gevuld met likeable content om direct te delen met vrienden en volgers. Nu kan jij de eerste zijn die het gesprek van de dag met een klik deelt. Wij schuimen het web voor je af op zoek naar de pareltjes van het internet. WTF.nl is even ontsnappen aan de waan van de dag. Jezelf onderdompelen in een warm bad, enerzijds als afleiding, omdat je behoefte hebt aan verwondering, verbazing, een positieve noot of simpelweg om invulling te geven aan je informatieverslaving. Het design van de app speelt hier op in, door de makkelijke en prettige manier waarop je de inhoud kan consumeren, maar ook door het gebruik van beeld, foto’s en video’s. De app bestaat grotendeels uit dezelfde katernen als op de website staan weergegeven. Werkt super simpel, is prettig scrollen en laadt lekker snel. Enjoy! On WTF you find entertaining, remarkable and controversial news from home and abroad. These are typically the messages and photos that you get redirected to your friends and everyone is talking about. The WTF.nl app is filled with likeable content to share instantly with friends and followers. Now you can be the first who shares the day the conversation with a click. We scour the web for you in search of the jewels of the Internet. WTF.nl's escape from the issues of the day. Immerse yourself in a hot tub, both as a distraction, because you need to wonder, amazement, a positive note, or simply to give substance to your information addiction. The design of the app is responding, by the easy and fun way you can consume the content, but also by the use of images, photos and videos. The app consists largely of the same sections as shown on the website. Works super simple, scrolling is nice and loads very quickly. Enjoy!

Gallery Vault (Without Ads) provides you privacy in your mobile phone from others, it lets you manage photos by hiding / unhiding them, it is an app that is absolutely needed for protection of personal privacy. Hide pictures behind a password. With Gallery Vault, privacy is no longer an issue. You can show your photo gallery to whomever you want because the private photos are all hidden, securely stored in your Private gallery. # #(Important!) Before deleting the free version, undo the hidden photos. If you uninstall the app without undoing the hide function, the photos will be lost. # #Important!) When running app in Stealth Mode you should never FORCE STOP your app by going into phone setting > Application Manager > Gallery Vault, that would make your application inaccessible, this is due to tighter security by Android OS from version 3.1 and above. * Please email us if you have any questions. Stealth Mode description given below. Main Features: - Browse Public & Private pictures from the application. - PIN support. - Simple hide/unhide one picture at a time. - Multi-select to hide/unhide group of pictures / folders. - Multi-select to delete group of pictures / folders. - Share both public and private images. - Management of photos by individual folders. - Stealth mode provided (a function that hides the icons). - Start application by dialing. - Gesture & timer driven slideshow for both public and private images. - Clean & intuitive UI design. - Scan all folders on SD card for public images. - Access camera directly from the app and add private images. - Pinch to zoom in-out image in picture viewer screen. - Basic image filter (for fun) Paid app does not have any Ads. # Default PIN for the app is 0000. # Stealth Mode You can also start application by dialing #1947 for free app and #8086 for paid app, for better security do change your PIN, change dial number and turn on Stealth Mode (default is Off) via setting screen in the app. # "Outgoing Call" permission is needed for Stealth Mode # If you are running app in Stealth mode you need to turn off that feature while updating to a new version of app. If you ever have any questions on how it all works, there are instructions in the app and links to online support and FAQs. Kindly note, the developer is actively working on Gallery Vault, adding new features and taking requests. description: Please Note - The Andy Droid shown in the Pictures is part of the Wallpaper not the Clock Skin :o) You MUST have UCCW 2.1.2 or higher installed on your device or this skin WILL NOT work. ****This skin will only appear in UCCW after you place a widget on your homescreen. It does not appear in your app drawer or if you open UCCW from your app drawer**** Three Hotspots available (See Picture) - 1. Open UCCW Editor 2. Open UCCW Editor 3. Open UCCW Editor Each Hotspot can be assigned to a different app/shortcut CLOCKS 1 - 4 Shape 1 - Hours 12, 3, 6 & 9 (Minutes 00, 15, 30 & 45) Shape 2 - Hours 1, 4, 7 & 10 (Minutes 5, 20, 35 & 50) Shape 3 - Hours 2, 5, 8 & 11 (Minutes 10, 25, 40 & 55) Shapes 4 - 15 - These shapes make up the rest of the minutes between the hours CLOCK 5 Shapes 1 - 15 Make up the Clock dials starting with shape 1 and working clockwise so........ Shapes 1 - 4, 6 - 9 & 11 - 14 Make up the minutes between the hours Shape 5 is Hours - 1, 4, 7 & 10 (Minutes 5, 20, 35 & 50) Shape 10 is Hours - 2, 5, 8 & 11 (Minutes 10, 25, 40 & 55) Shape 15 is Hours - 12, 3, 6 & 9 (Minutes 00, 15, 30 & 45) Shapes 17 & 19 Make up the shapes in the centre The colours of each of these shapes can be changed Adding skin to your homescreen 1. Add a 3x3 (or a 2x2 or 4x4) UCCW widget to your homescreen by long pressing the homescreen or browsing widgets in app drawer 2. Select Kaleidoscope Clock from UCCW menu 3. Resize before hitting "Touch Here" (This is so that the Hotspots will be correctly aligned) 4. Hit "Touch Here" to load the skin If you have any problems or queries please do not hesitate to email me Enjoy and thank you :o) Specials Thanks to Sir Robert Best for coming up with the name :o)

description: This App allows to track stock prices through watch list. Add as many stocks to watchlist. Check all details of stock that includes last traded price, day volume, previous close, day high and low, 52 week high low and latest news. Track your investment by adding your stocks in portfolio and check real time profit and loss. Other features * Home Screen Widget * Historical 1 year, 6 month, 3 month, 1 month, 5 days and intra-day chart * Stock search * World Currency rates Only for India: * Stock FUTURE BUY and SELL can be tracked in Portfolio * Latest market news of buzzing stock, Recommendations and Dividend payout with ex-dates * Watch all sector indices and world index * Top NSE and BSE, gainers and losers * MCXCommodity watch Supported exchanges: National Stock Exchange (NSE), Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE), NASDAQ, New York Stock Exchange (NYSE), London Stock Exchange LSE, Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX), Australian Stock Exchange (ASX), Singapore Exchange (SGX), Stock Exchange of Thailand (SET) For any feedback, bug/issue reporting and feature requests please contact at ssmmobi@gmail.com

description: Avoid those tiny, frustrating buttons on your smartphone keyboard and enjoy big buttons in the most advanced smartphone keyboard layout in the world. (attn. devs - the patented Delta II keyboard matrix can be licensed - see below*) Big Buttons Keyboard also has bigger number & punctuation buttons, making EVERYTHING you type on your smartphone EASIER and more ACCURATE! But the MAGIC is in the patented Delta II modified-QWERTY keyboard layout with large keys and is surprisingly FAST, ACCURATE & EXTREMELY quick-to-learn!! Important - Big Buttons will NOT work until it is installed!! Press the blue & green BB icon, then press "Installation - Important" at the top of the menu and do both installation steps - it's easy. A more powerful version of Big Buttons Keyboard is available - Big Buttons Keyboard DELUXE ($2.99) includes themes, voice-to-text microphone, word prediction, large cursor keys & more. Note 1 - Big Buttons Keyboard is a secure app that requires no risky permissions to run. Note 2 - ALL Android keyboard apps scare you with this warning: "Attention - This input method may be able to collect all the text you type..." Do not worry, we are a safe app - please check our permissions & privacy policy. We don't collect any of your information, nor do we access the internet, your email, text messages, etc. Note 3 - If any download from the Android Market hangs, go to your: Settings > Applications > Manage Applications > Market: Then Clear data and Clear cache. Then try to download again. About the Delta II Keyboard Matrix Skydiving equipment designers consider the user's muscle memory reflexes to make their products consistent and quick to learn & operate. Chicago Logic uses the same muscle memory consideration to create a superior mobile keyboard having big, easy to read, accurate to press buttons - arranged in an ingenious layout that is learned almost immediately. The patented Delta II tm modified QWERTY keyboard layout appeals to your muscle memory reflexes. Every letter is in proximity to where you already look and reach for it on your PC (QWERTY) keyboard. The result? Your muscle memory reflexes cause you to learn and type on the new keyboard extremely fast. Only with way fewer typos!! Whether reaching for emergency handles on a parachute harness, or reaching for buttons on a keyboard - you want your muscle memory reflexes working with you, not against you. Delta II - Born for Mobile. Welcome to Big Buttons Keyboard for Android. * Attention mobile developers, manufacturers, integrators - don't force impossibly small QWERTY on your customers. Give them a superior, proven mobile keyboard layout - designed for humans. License Delta II for use in smartphones, TV remotes, portable medical equipment, automobiles, aircraft cockpits, etc. Delta II is compatible with touch screens, hard button keyboards, next word predictors, swiper's, stylus, handicapped accessibility, senior citizens, and more. US Patent 7,658,562. Contact: bizdev@chicagologic.com
